sentences.english: This is all natural and safe.
sentences.chinese: 这个是全天然和安全的。

sentences.english: Markets see-sawed all day, with S&P officials refusing to comment on their plans.
sentences.chinese: 市场全天反复涨跌，标普高管拒绝就其计划置评。

sentences.english: Drinking water throughout the day is an important habit to pick up.
sentences.chinese: 全天候饮水补水是个必须养成的重要习惯。

sentences.english: Use saline nasal spray as directed throughout the day.
sentences.chinese: 按指导用生理盐水制成鼻喷雾，全天使用。

sentences.english: Zardari said the two countries are all-weather close friends.
sentences.chinese: 扎尔达里表示，巴中是全天候的亲密朋友。

sentences.english: AKK can all day Hou Shi used in various environments, is not susceptible to interference.
sentences.chinese: AKK可全天侯适用于各个环境，不易受干扰。

sentences.english: The synthetic-rubber track can be used in all weathers on condition that the drainage facilities are good.
sentences.chinese: 塑胶跑道在排水设施完善的条件下，可供全天候使用。

sentences.english: Both countries have become all-weather friends that rely on each other.
sentences.chinese: 中也两国已成为相互信赖的全天候朋友。

sentences.english: Pakistan and China are all-weather and time-tested friends.
sentences.chinese: 巴基斯坦与中国是久经考验的全天候的伙伴。

sentences.english: In all-day viewing, Fox News rose 26 percent.
sentences.chinese: 在全天收视率调查中，福克斯新闻上升26%。

sentences.english: Super soft fabric lining offers climate control and all-day comfort.
sentences.chinese: 超柔软的织物面料提供气候控制和全天的舒适感。

sentences.english: My wife and I were together 24-7 and parenting knocked us on our asses.
sentences.chinese: 而我与妻全天候守护着，育儿使我们倦极厌尽。

sentences.english: The face of disturbances spread, the deployment of 24-hour police shifts Vian.
sentences.chinese: 面对骚乱蔓延，当局部署全天24小时警察轮班维安。

sentences.english: This all-natural, organic glide-coat is designed to make swallowing your vitamins effortless.
sentences.chinese: 这种全天然，有机滑行外套是为了使吞咽维他命轻松。

sentences.english: Facts prove that China and Namibia are reliable all-weather friends.
sentences.chinese: 事实证明，中纳是可以相互信赖的全天候朋友。

definition: (of a stock price or market index) currently higher than at the previous day's close
(of a stock price or market index) currently lower than at the previous day's close
stock market index/share price index/abbr. for 股票指數|股票指数[gu3 piao4 zhi3 shu4]
Shanghai Stock Exchange (SSE), abbr. for 上海證券交易所|上海证券交易所[Shang4 hai3 Zheng4 quan4 Jiao1 yi4 suo3]
(of a stock on the stock market) to close at (a certain price)
slab/(geology) tectonic plate/(fig.) sector (of the stock market or of industry)/(economic) bloc
